page.title: 15OUR LOCAL RADIO STATION
page.content: {Radio Wyvern }is our Local Radio Station. Here are some of the times of the programmes. On Monday Graham Hall is at 1 o'clock until 6 o'clock. Mike George is on the Breakfast Show, and Roy Leonard is on at Lunchtime, and so on. They have three studios but only one is used unless some thing goes wrong! They record everything.They put everything that has happened that day in our area on a big disc. They broadcast local news every so often. Local people and businesses can advertise on this station. They have a birthday spot, a missing pet spot and quizzes. I won a Radio Wyvern sweatshirt on the spin the wheel quiz. My family listen quite regularly. I am Adrian Farmer, aged 9.
